## getIndicator() function

Returns the indicator for the given file mode.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getIndicator(mode: number): string;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

mode


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

File mode bits (from fs.Stats.mode)


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string

Indicator character: - "/" for directory - "\|" for named pipe - `@` for symbolic link - "=" for socket - "\*" for executable - "" for regular file

## Example


```typescript
const stats = fs.statSync('myfile');
const indicator = getIndicator(stats.mode);
```
